alert.note: Alert for Kent; Queen Anne's (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 9:14PM EDT until July 02 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mount Holly NJ has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Queen Anne`s County in northeastern Maryland... Kent County in northeastern Maryland... * Until 1000 PM EDT. * At 914 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Perryman to 6 miles east of Millers Island, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. * Locations impacted include... Chestertown, Millington, Sudlersville, Betterton, Newtown, Sassafras, Morgnec, Massey, Crumpton, Kennedyville, Galena and Kingstown. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
